waffleoRai_cafebotCommands

Class CommandAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • waffleoRai_cafebotCommands.CommandAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Command
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CMD_AddBirthday, CMD_BadCommandMessage, CMD_CancelEvent, CMD_ChChan, CMD_CleanMessages, CMD_Eventhelp, CMD_GetTZ, CMD_Help, CMD_InsufficientArgs, CMD_NewMemberNotify, CMD_OtherBotHandledMessage, CMD_ParserBlockWarn, CMD_qChan, CMD_SaySomething, CMD_SeeEvents, CMD_SeeTZ, CMD_SetTZ, CMD_SOR, CMD_UpdateStatusAtShift, CMD_WishBirthday

    public abstract class CommandAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements Command
    An abstract class implementing the less commonly used Command methods as either empty methods or general methods.
    Command classes that don't prompt for user input would be well suited for CommandAdapter extension.
    Since:
    July 1, 2018
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Blythe Hospelhorn

    • Method Detail

      • getChannelID

        public long getChannelID()
        Get the raw Long Integer UID of the channel this command is set to send messages to.
        Returns:
        The Discord channel UID for the message target of this command. If there is no message channel set for this command, this method returns -1.
